data.name: Deicider Demo
data.detailed_description:
Deicider is a roguelike, 2d Dungeon crawling - arena hybrid

Fight in the Creator's Arena to win back your freedom.
Explore the dungeons to find powerful equipment.
Impress the crowds of the prison, or start a riot to overtake the guards.

This demo includes for Deicider includes:
- 1 level
- 4 equipment types with a total of 17 items
- 3 enemy types, 3 prison member types, and 1 boss

We have been working hard to create this demo, and hope you enjoy it!

data.short_description: Win back your freedom through gladiatorial combat and discover the secrets of the arena and its creator. Arm yourself with the strongest equipment you can find and face this crooked, 2D, roguelike, dungeon crawler.
